message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, given its value. Let me know your thoughts!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm hoping to keep the price within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000? I appreciate your consideration.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I appreciate your offer, I can't go as low as $11,000.  I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
